configurationItems.name: url
configurationItems.description: Define the url of the service

configurationItems.name: key
configurationItems.description: Define the API key used to connect the service

configurationItems.name: secret
configurationItems.description: Define the secret used to connect the service

configurationItems.name: environmentId
configurationItems.description: Define the environment Id used by the service

configurationItems.name: timeout
configurationItems.description: Define the timeout of requests to the service
